# v0.12.1

## 🚀 Features


## 🐛 Fixes

- E2E test for login page fixed 
- SfImage: removed fit property validation in `nuxtImgConfig` prop, allowed to pass `width` and `height` value as String type and added validation for non Integer values, change props in all components utilizing SfImage accordingly,
